original_title: Die amerikanische Botschaft oder Warum wir uns bewegen
overview: January 2003, on the eve of the American lead Iraq campaign, a young couple tries to improvise a protest-march heading to the American Embassy in Berlin under the motto "No blood for oil". As nobody shows the solidarity they were trying to gain, the couple starts an argument and the "movement" seems doomed to fail.
title: The American Embassasy or Why We are Moving
